meanings.meaning: no matter who, what, where, etc.

vlive.korean: [이때만 하더라도 만월이가 웃었었는데...] [Up until this point, Manwol was smiling...] View video IU : [IU TV] '호텔 델루나' 장만월의 바깥 나들이
vlive.english: [Up until this point, Manwol was smiling...]

vlive.korean: 돌아간다 하더라도 - 넌 아니야? that, even if I had to do it again, - He's not the one? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]WEB INSIDE - 일진에게 찍혔을 때 & 리얼하이로맨스 시즌2 (WEB INSIDE - Best Mistake & Real Highschool Romance S2)
vlive.english: that, even if I had to do it again, - He's not the one?

vlive.korean: 찬희 씨, 제가 만약에 잠버릇이 있다 하더라도 찬희는 못 봐요, 왠 줄 알아요? CHA NI, even if I have bad sleep habits, you can't see them. You know why? 듣기 View video SF9 : 찬희
vlive.english: CHA NI, even if I have bad sleep habits, you can't see them. You know why?

vlive.korean: 못 하더라도 웃으시면 안 돼요. You can't laugh at me even if I'm bad at it. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MYSTIC Ent.] 한 요만큼(빼고 다) 귀여운 여보뚜💖 (Suhyun's first alone V!)
vlive.english: You can't laugh at me even if I'm bad at it.

vlive.korean: 진리상점이 삼류 만화일지라고 하더라도? You mean, even if "Jinri Market" is like a really lame comic book? 듣기 View video SM CCC LAB : [진리상점│Jinri Market]EP07. SULLI FAMILY
vlive.english: You mean, even if "Jinri Market" is like a really lame comic book?

examples.korean: I would do the same again. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 다시 하더라도 똑같이 하겠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: We’ll only do it once—if at all. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그것을 한 번만 할 것이다. 한다 하더라도. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The weather, even for January, was exceptionally cold. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 날씨가 1월이라 하더라도 유난히 추웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The weather, even for January, was exceptionally cold. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We see them very seldom, if ever. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그들을 본다 하더라도[전혀 만나지 않는 것은 아니지만] 아주 드물게 본다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
